oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Harvey's Department Story, Church Street, n.d.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of Harvey's Department Store at the corner of Church Street and 6th Avenue North, not dated. The Tennessee Theater is visible on the right. Photographed by the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
